dict.string: Try changing the storyline variable from .Medieval to .Space and vice-versa, to alter between storyline modes.
Try changing the heroColor variable between the available colors .Red, .Blue, .Green, .Purple and .Yellow, to customize your hero.
Try changing the shotImpulsePower variable to change the force of the shot.
Try changing the fallingDuration variable to customize the duration of the falling movement of the enemies.
Try changing the newEnemyDuration variable to customize the spawn time between enemies.
Try changing the enemyExplosionSound variable between the available sounds to change the sound of an explosion.
Try changing the backgroundMusic variable between the available sounds to change the background music of the game.
